Sentencas: LaBO3 (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) perovskites form a family of materials of significant interest for cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: In this paper ab initio methods are used to study both bulk and surface properties of relevance for SOFCs, including vacancy formation and oxygen binding energies.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: A thermodynamic approach and the density functional theory plus U method are combined to obtain energies relevant for SOFC conditions (T approximate to 800 degrees C, PO2 approximate to 0.2 atm).
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The impact of varying U-eff (U-eff=U-J) on energy and electronic structure is explored in detail and it is shown that optimal U-eff values yield significantly better agreement with experimental energies than U-eff=0 (which corresponds to the standard generalized gradient approximation).
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: LaBO3 oxygen vacancy formation energies are predicted to be in the order Fe>Mn>Co>Ni (where the largest implies most difficult to form a vacancy).
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: It is shown that (001) BO2 terminated surfaces have 1-2 eV lower vacancy formation energies and therefore far higher vacancy concentrations than the bulk.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The stable surface species at low temperature are predicted to be the superoxide O-2(-) for B=Mn, Fe, Co and a peroxide O-2(2-) with a surface oxygen for B=Ni.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Entropy effects are predicted to stabilize the monomer oxygen surface state for all B cations at higher temperatures.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Overall oxygen coverage of the (001) BO2 surface is predicted to be quite low at SOFC operating conditions.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: These results will aid in understanding the oxygen reduction reaction on perovskite SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Ab initio energetics of LaBO3(001) (B=Mn, Fe, Co, and Ni) for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
